title: Bullfighter Jacket (Demo)
lyrics:
There's nothing for me here at home 
Everything I need is with you out east 
I can't wait any longer 
No one seems to understand 
How I long to be in the palm of your hand 
I can't wait anymore



Pale skin, a black bow in your hair 

I know that you're half crazy 

But I don't care 



You've got your bullfighter jacket on 

Nothing beneath 

I had to take my mask off 

To kiss you in the street 

Summer turns to fall 

My head's up on your wall 



Nothing seems to stay the same 

I'm terrified to lose you but more afraid to change 



Summer's here you're taking off your clothes 

Take my skin to add to your collection 



You've got your bullfighter jacket on 

Nothing beneath 

I had to take my mask off 

To kiss you in the street 

Summer turns to fall 

My head's up on your wall
